job description:
Job Summary - a concise overview of the job

The successful candidate will provide fermentation, technical, and statistical expertise in support of commercial manufacturing, process validation and process improvement, and analytical projects. Key areas of focus include execution of scale down models of the fermentation process for process improvement, process trouble-shooting and resolution of deviations, validation studies, qualification of raw materials, and development and optimization of production fermentation processes. This candidate will provide timely input and evaluation of changes and process outputs, as well as make recommendations for resolution of problems or areas for improvement. This role is responsible for the Continuous Process Verification process.

All incumbents are responsible for following applicable Division & Company policies and procedures.

Scope of Authority - span of control (work unit, site, department, division, etc.), monetary value of budget/spend authority ( capital, operating, etc.), P&L responsibility, etc.

Responsible for the Manufacturing Technology activities for the Horsham, PA site including expense and capital budget development, forecasting, and maintenance. Responsible for working cross-functionally with the Manufacturing, Validation, Quality Control, Quality Assurance, Materials Management, Manufacturing Technology, and R&D teams.
